Package org.spongepowered.api.entity.attribute

Interface AttributeModifier

All Superinterfaces:
Identifiable
public interface AttributeModifier extends Identifiable
Represents a modifier to a value in a Attribute which is transformed by an AttributeOperation.

Modifiers are usually found on ItemStacks.

    Represents a builder class to create AttributeModifiers.
